duelist's lunge.name: Duelist's Lunge
duelist's lunge.desc: [Rapier] Running Basic Attacks deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running Basic Attack has increased range.

pressure skewer.name: Pressure Skewer
pressure skewer.desc: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your Basic Attacks to deal additional blood loss until you take damage.

frenzied dance.name: Frenzied Dance
frenzied dance.desc: [Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.
